member.name: M:Project.Net.Controllers.AngajatsController.GetAngajati(System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset},System.Nullable{System.DateTimeOffset})
member.summary: Get a list of all CostItems. The list can be fitered by date ( from - to ) and by type.
member.param: Filter costs by date from. If the parameter is empty, all the costs will be displayed
Filter costs by date to. If the parameter is empty, all the costs will be displayed
